filmes.Title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
filmes.Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Michael Gambon, Dave Legeno, Elarica Johnson
filmes.Plot: As Harry Potter begins his sixth year at Hogwarts, he discovers an old book marked as "the property of the Half-Blood Prince" and begins to learn more about Lord Voldemort's dark past.
filmes.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 8 wins & 33 nominations.

filmes.Title: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time
filmes.Writer: Boaz Yakin (screenplay), Doug Miro (screenplay), Carlo Bernard (screenplay), Jordan Mechner (screen story), Jordan Mechner (video game series "Prince of Persia")
filmes.Actors: Jake Gyllenhaal, Gemma Arterton, Ben Kingsley, Alfred Molina
filmes.Plot: A young fugitive prince and princess must stop a villain who unknowingly threatens to destroy the world with a special dagger that enables the magic sand inside to reverse time.

filmes.Title: The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian
filmes.Writer: Andrew Adamson (screenplay), Christopher Markus (screenplay), Stephen McFeely (screenplay), C.S. Lewis (novel)
filmes.Actors: Ben Barnes, Georgie Henley, Skandar Keynes, William Moseley
filmes.Plot: The Pevensie siblings return to Narnia, where they are enlisted to once again help ward off an evil king and restore the rightful heir to the land's throne, Prince Caspian.

filmes.Title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
filmes.Writer: Pen Densham (story), Pen Densham (screenplay), John Watson (screenplay)
filmes.Actors: Kevin Costner, Morgan Freeman, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio, Christian Slater
filmes.Plot: When Robin and his Moorish companion come to England and the tyranny of the Sheriff of Nottingham, he decides to fight back as an outlaw.
filmes.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 16 wins & 17 nominations.

filmes.Title: The Prince of Egypt
filmes.Director: Brenda Chapman, Steve Hickner, Simon Wells
filmes.Writer: Philip LaZebnik, Nicholas Meyer (additional screenplay material)
filmes.Actors: Val Kilmer, Ralph Fiennes, Michelle Pfeiffer, Sandra Bullock
filmes.Plot: An Egyptian prince learns of his identity as a Hebrew, and later, his destiny to become the chosen deliverer of his people.

filmes.Title: The Little Prince
filmes.Writer: Irena Brignull (screenplay), Bob Persichetti (screenplay), Antoine de Saint-Exupéry (novel)
filmes.Actors: Jeff Bridges, Mackenzie Foy, Rachel McAdams, Marion Cotillard
filmes.Plot: A little girl lives in a very grown-up world with her mother, who tries to prepare her for it. Her neighbor, the Aviator, introduces the girl to an extraordinary world where anything is possible, the world of the Little Prince.

filmes.Title: The Prince and Me
filmes.Writer: Mark Amin (story), Katherine Fugate (story), Jack Amiel (screenplay), Michael Begler (screenplay), Katherine Fugate (screenplay)
filmes.Actors: Julia Stiles, Luke Mably, Ben Miller, Miranda Richardson
filmes.Plot: At college Paige meets Eddie, a fellow student from Denmark, whom she first dislikes but later accepts, likes, and loves; he proves to be Crown Prince Edvard. Paige follows him to Copenhagen, and he follows her back to school with a plan.

filmes.Title: Prince of Darkness
filmes.Actors: Donald Pleasence, Jameson Parker, Victor Wong, Lisa Blount
filmes.Plot: A research team finds a mysterious cylinder in a deserted church. If opened, it could mean the end of the world.

filmes.Title: Prince Avalanche
filmes.Writer: David Gordon Green, Hafsteinn Gunnar Sigurðsson (based on the film "Either Way")
filmes.Actors: Paul Rudd, Emile Hirsch, Lance LeGault, Joyce Payne
filmes.Plot: Two highway road workers spend the summer of 1988 away from their city lives. The isolated landscape becomes a place of misadventure as the men find themselves at odds with each other and the women they left behind.

filmes.Title: The Prince
filmes.Actors: Jason Patric, Jessica Lowndes, Gia Mantegna, Bruce Willis
filmes.Plot: When his daughter is kidnapped, a retired assassin is drawn back into the life he gave up. To rescue her, he must confront his former rival.
